parts.text:
```json
{
  "id": "SF2E-JOB-001",
  "title": "The Kalo's Lament",
  "hook": "A prominent Kalo xenobotanist has gone missing in the perilous jungles of Castrovel, along with her invaluable research data. Her distraught family offers a hefty sum for her safe return and the recovery of her work.",
  "difficulty": 6,
  "reward": "15,000 credits, a rare xenobotanical sample (worth 2,000 credits), and a favor from the Kalo family.",
  "gm_notes": "The xenobotanist, Dr. Elara K'tharr, wasn't kidnapped. She stumbled upon a hidden cult of plant-worshipping Sro who believe her research threatens their sacred grove. They are holding her captive but haven't harmed her. The 'invaluable research' is actually a map to a powerful, ancient Sro artifact that Dr. K'tharr unknowingly documented. The Sro cult leader, 'The Verdant Voice,' is a powerful Sro Mystic.",
  "encounters": [
    "Wilderness Survival Check (DC 18) to navigate Castrovel's jungle.",
    "Combat: Giant carnivorous plants and aggressive fungal creatures (CR 5).",
    "Social: Encounter a lost survey team; they might offer info or need rescue.",
    "Investigation: Deciphering Dr. K'tharr's scattered notes to find her trail (DC 16).",
    "Combat/Social: Confrontation with the Sro cultists (CR 7 for combat, or DC 20 Diplomacy/Intimidation for peaceful resolution)."
  ],
  "npcs": [
    {
      "name": "J'lar K'tharr",
      "role": "Distraught Brother, Quest Giver",
      "description": "A wealthy Kalo merchant, desperate for his sister's return."
    },
    {
      "name": "Dr. Elara K'tharr",
      "role": "Missing Xenobotanist",
      "description": "Brilliant but naive Kalo scientist, currently held captive."
    },
    {
      "name": "The Verdant Voice",
      "role": "Sro Cult Leader, Antagonist",
      "description": "A powerful Sro Mystic dedicated to protecting the ancient Sro artifact and their sacred grove."
    }
  ]
}
```

```json
{
  "id": "sf2e-job-001-kalo-cargo",
  "title": "The Kalo's Lost Cargo",
  "hook": "A frantic Kalo trader is desperate to recover a shipment of rare minerals stolen by space pirates in the Diaspora. High reward for discretion and speed!",
  "difficulty": 5,
  "reward": "15,000 credits, a rare tech item (GM's choice), and a favor from the Kalo Trading Guild.",
  "gm_notes": "The 'rare minerals' are actually unrefined xenodermal components for a new type of bio-weapon. The pirates, the 'Void Weasels,' are led by a disgraced Starfinder named Jax 'The Jaw' Krell. He's operating out of a hidden asteroid base near the Ring of Broken Worlds. The Kalo trader, Zylax, knows more than he lets on and will try to double-cross the PCs if they discover the true nature of the cargo.",
  "encounters": [
    "Space combat: Ambush by Void Weasel scout ship (Tier 4).",
    "Infiltration: Navigating a booby-trapped asteroid base.",
    "Combat: Confrontation with Void Weasel crew and Jax Krell (CR 6).",
    "Social: Negotiating with Zylax after cargo recovery."
  ],
  "npcs": [
    {
      "name": "Zylax",
      "role": "Kalo Trader",
      "description": "A nervous but shrewd Kalo with six eyes constantly darting around. Wears expensive, tailored clothing and carries a data-slate everywhere."
    },
    {
      "name": "Jax 'The Jaw' Krell",
      "role": "Disgraced Starfinder, Pirate Captain",
      "description": "A gruff human male with cybernetic enhancements, including a reinforced jaw. Wears a custom-built power armor suit and wields a heavy plasma rifle. Charismatic but ruthless."
    }
  ]
}
```
